item.title: A New Chapter: Rediscovering the Joy of Writing
item.description:
It’s a new chapter, and I’m finding my footing again in this space, with the arrival of a new platform, and with the pagesetting and spelling expertise that AI brings (or pushes uncontrollably) into the mix, it makes some tasks easier and some harder.

I’m grateful for the opportunity to have a fresh start, but also to a friend and colleague who took an extract of an old platform that has a number of old posts from the mid-2010s.
